message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'm only willing to pay $800000 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll be forced to go with John's offer instead.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1100000 is still a bit too high for me. While I recognize the product's uniqueness, I'm only able to offer $900000. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to move forward with John's offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1000000. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'll sell the product to you for $1050000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
